Volunteer welfare rights adviser SWLICAN Skem. 🏳️‍🌈 Disabled, twisty, humpty backed bastard. Anti-theist, Anti-Tory, Anti-Blue Labour, Anti-war. Liking pancakes doesn't mean I hate waffles. No government will save or represent you. Help each other, it's not difficult UK/Éire

Time for a proper introduction. I am a literature teacher, mostly retired. I love reading, music, baking, nature & cats. I am learning to boost a lot, which includes my passion for a truly inclusive world, so lots of support for Black, Indigenous, LGBTQIA+, Women, Working Class, & other rights. I understand users who want Mastodon to be a quiet corner, but I am more concerned about what happens if we look the other way when people suffer.

Retired, married, and has ADHD. Arctophile, sciencey stuff, computer/infosec, cooking, books of all formats and growing vegetables.

I learnt BASIC in 1977, and my first computer was an Acorn Atom on which I learnt to programme in Assembler. First proper IT job maintaining an old COBOL based mainframe application that first went live in 1971.

Woofian is an old demonym for my home town in Warwickshire. Now I live in North Kent.

I am also known as Great Uncle Zanzibar

I am a retired academic, with an MA & PhD in Social Policy & Administration from the Universities of York & Kent respectively. I am disabled, & am deeply concerned about human, gay and disability rights, the climate emergency and the biodiversity crisis. I am currently politically homeless. I like films, classical music, jazz, and reading.

商品の状態には細心の注意を払っておりますが、完璧にチェックすることができない場合もございます。予めご了承ください。中古品であるため、美品をお求めの方はご遠慮いただきますようお願い申し上げます。

※ペット、喫煙者はおりません。

[ お取引について ]

取引のメッセージの有無や評価の遅延により、評価を低くすることはございません。お忙しい中、商品をご購入いただけることに感謝しておりますので、お忙しい方も安心してご購入ください。

My name is Elizabeth but please call me Lisa.

I'm probably best known as the person who started the #Safari and #WebKit projects at #Apple. You may think you know my deadname but... you don't.

I've drawn underground comics, pioneered using a Mac for newspaper graphics and developed software at Adobe and Netscape.

Now I write video #transcoding scripts and sometimes podcast.

Follow me and I'll fill your timeline with boosts.
